derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, named after Daniel E. Salmon (1850–1914), American veterinary surgeon

entry.def: Salmonella is a disease caused by bacteria in food. You can also refer to the bacteria itself as salmonella .

example.ex: He was suffering from salmonella poisoning.
example.tran: 他因感染了沙门氏菌而食物中毒。

means.word_mean: 1. rod-shaped gram-negative enterobacteria; cause typhoid fever and food poisoning; can be used as a bioweapon
